preferences.name: Limit
preferences.description: The maximal number of search results.

preferences.name: Tags
preferences.description: The comma-separated tags to add to created cards.

preferences.name: Maximal number of rows
preferences.description: The maximal number of rows displayed in an item's description.

preferences.name: Open in

preferences.description: Specify how to append a new string to your daily note.
